website_summaries.verdict: An economical model that still has some of the features of the higher-end models.
pros: Includes LED lighting for a bright interior
Comes with a factory installed ice maker
Quiet operation with a traditional style

customer_reviews.title: delivery was fine, packaging was secure
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. It works. But the surface will not withstand even a breath of pressure. We haven't even used this for its designated purpose yet....and there are three dents in it. It didn't come that way; delivery was fine, packaging was secure. We had a professional installer come and that resulted in the first ding. Then, it had to be moved a few inches and....oops....another TWO dings. I can't imagine what would happen if one had children (or large, overanxious dogs) in the house!
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years - been witing for needed part to repair from Sears for weeks
customer_reviews.text: I originally liked this refrigerator. It was energy efficient and if the bottom shelf was a little close to frozen to keep the rest of the refrigerator at the right temperature, I could almost treat that like a feature, not a bug. Unfortunately, in the past I always trusted Kenmore appliances to be durable and this was not. After two years, the fan motor broke and I have been waiting for weeks for the backordered part to arrive from Sears with no estimate as to when it will actually arrive. I will not buy Kenmore again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, when I needed it!
customer_reviews.text: My refrigerator I had previously constantly had problems. I had to find a new one that was affordable, fast delivery, and had an ice maker. I found all that with this one. Delivery team was professional and knowledgeable. I had never used Amazon for a large appliance, but I might only shop with them now. Delivery team also was early, I got a phone call letting me know they were ahead of schedule. I like that! Normally I would get stuck waiting for a delivery well past the intended time with other providers or big box stores. Refrigerator works great, and looks good too. Nothing too fancy, it does it’s job and I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Are old fridge was leaking and after about 15 years it was time to replace. I read all of Amazons reviews and they are quite accurate on this product. The date of delivery was exact. The movers did an excellent job and were enjoyable to talk to. The product isn't top of the line but the price is quite reasonable and works great. Its also guaranteed for a good period of time by Amazon. NO intentions of replacing but the insurance is there. Not sure about the Kenmore-Sears idea but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous12345

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product and it not even a year old and the refrigerator is not getting cold. I just came back after being away for a week and it had a foul odor I lost hundreds of dollars in food. Given that I purchased this refrigerator September 28, 2018 I am quite curious on what if anything the manufacturer will do. Such a horrible experience
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the aggravation!
customer_reviews.text: Update- After Only 4 months the freezer started acting up by no longer self defrosting. Then a week after that the refrigerator area stopped working!! Currently I have a freezer making snow and a fridge not cooling down at all- lost all my dairy and meats! Good basic refrigerator for the price. It’s quite, has an ice maker and came with free delivery, set up and haul away. Do wish it had a light in the freezer, but so far that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fridge for the garage and are very glad we did. It's been a couple of months and we love having it. It's not as fancy as those new ones but it is extremely efficient. We haven't noticed a rise at all in our electric bill. So, large capacity. Keeps everything cool, and the price was very reasonable!!
customer_reviews.author: William Hearn

customer_reviews.title: warranty is essentially useless.
customer_reviews.text: We bought our refrigerator a year ago, and within the warranty period it stopped working. Repair guys came out, said a part was needed, and 2 months have gone by and now we are told the part is on back order. We have tried to just get the unit replaced, but get the runaround by customer service, getting shunted from one department and operator to another. Sometimes talking to someone in India who doesn't know what to do. Really inept customer service. I am very disappointed with Kenmore over this issue. I will never buy another appliance from them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Freezer thaws, fridge freezes :(
customer_reviews.text: We bought this refrigerator in April 2018. No matter how we set the temperature control, the freezer won't stay cold, so foods thaw and freeze repeatedly - and the fridge freezes foods! I can't keep fresh veggies more than a day, or they'll freeze and be ruined. Very disappointed. I wish we'd bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: brontefan

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Only need to have a plumber come install a water connection so the ice maker will work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! I didn't realize that my old fridge was a bit smaller. A few. Extra inches really makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is manufactured by Daewoo in Mexico. Less than 2 years old and not freezer is icing up, preventing refrigerator from cooling. Was going to take $350 and 2 weeks to fix. At only 14 months, I had a problem with the refrigerator freezing up. I have another fridge on order and can’t wait to get this one out of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Johnbo

customer_reviews.title: Durable and energy saving
customer_reviews.text: We had a breakdown of the old refrigerator after 15 years of service. The Kenmore replacement went smoothly as the crew took out the old one and put the Kenmore in within one hour. I couldn't be happier as everything was covered in the price I paid on-line.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great product but delivery and setup could be better
customer_reviews.text: Our refrigerator works great and we are happy with it. The delivery service did not call 30mins before delivery as promised. We had little time to transfer food. Delivery service wanted to leave and not take old refrigerator before we were finished transferring food. My wife had to insist they wait and take old refrigerator. All worked out OK in the end, new refrigerator installed and old refrigerator was taken away. Thanks, Johnnie
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Walton

customer_reviews.title: Kenmore refrigerator stopped after 3 months!!
customer_reviews.text: This Kenmore refrigerator has already broken down! I bought it August 2018 and now November 2018 it’s fan has stopped working so all of my cold and frozen items need to be stored at my neighbor’s house! They are coming to repair it next week. I will let you know how that works out! I won’t buy another Kenmore item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The delivery service was excellent. They did arrive 40 minutes early
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a 20 year old fridge that had been moved to the garage 3 years ago and was having trouble with the Houston Texas heat. The new fridge with the improved insulation seems to be much more effective after only 4 days in use. The delivery service was excellent. They did arrive 40 minutes early, (very unusual in this day and age) and were very professional in the set up and clean up after the job. The only minor complaint would be the amount of protective plastic remaining from assembly. It is in joints/seems and would require disassembly to remove. A razor would probably damage the finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad installation beware!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered without turning on the ice maker and won’t make right by this issue after the fact! I am disgusted thus far. This unit was supposed to make ice and upon installation they didn’t even hook that up.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Falk

customer_reviews.title: Product description  accurately  described. Great garage refrigerator for price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Black refrigerator to replace a 28 year old GE refrigerator that we had running in our garage until it was blown out by lightening. The prompt delivery and set up was included. We were very happy with the whole process including the courteous crew. The refrigerator was exactly as advertised and a good buy for the price. Note this is only one of a very few refrigerators on the market that will work in a garage and tolerate high or low outdoor temps.
customer_reviews.author: helpfulhelen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 21 sq ft Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a 21 sq ft refrigerator. Includes free delivery and removal of old fridge. Includes ice maker. Unit is Energy Star compliant. I had second business day delivery. Reversable handles and hinges for the doors. You can’t find a better value for a major-brand refrigerator, period.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, set up. This is a good fridge and I've had bad fridges, so it's a relief. Looks very nice and works perfectly after a year. Definitely keeps things cold and no issues with the ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Libra for libros

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge. Great delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge! Simple, has an ice maker, practically silent. The Amazon delivery was easier than any other delivery I’ve experienced before; it was seamless. They even give you a contact number days before the delivery and free haul away of the old fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Booger

customer_reviews.title: Please, Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on Wednesday, delivery was excellent however the fridge simply doesnt work. It's been 72 hours and freezer wont drop below 60. Kenmore doesnt offer customer service on the weekend and I've now have to throw away all my food because the old fridge was hauled off and I dont even know when/if I can get maintenance, which shouldn't even be an issue. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product at a great price! They delivered it, set it up, and took off our old refrigerator on a Saturday morning! I ordered it on Wednesday, and it was delivered that Saturday. We are extremely pleased with our purchase...,
customer_reviews.author: Wallie Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Can they ever really fix this?
customer_reviews.text: So far I've had two issues with this product. The ice maker, which doesn't fit in the freezer as I think it should, and the freezer itself. I've already had one service call and now I'll have to do it again. I can't afford to have this thing leaking on my kitchen floor forever. Think long and hard before purchasing this product. My experience has not been a good one.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Nolley

customer_reviews.title: Great Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I like the low price, the fast delivery, the in home setup by the deliverymen, and the fact that they took my old refrigerator. The refrigerator has all the same features as the one I replaced. Still a big Kenmore fan for reliability and price.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Pike

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports Rated Kenmore 71212 white refrigerator highly
customer_reviews.text: It cooled right away. I'm done with stainless steel refrigerators. White brightens the kitchen and is a breeze to wipe clean. The top freezer and bottom fridge ended up giving more room for my food.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: lots of room. the door is very efficient for storing everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The frig was exactly what I wanted. The men arrive early took out my old frig and placed the new one. Removed all the packaging and hooked up the icemaker. They were in and out in just 30 minutes. Very professional and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Art Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: The freezer is constantly wet and everything gets freezer burn over night. There is no light in the freezer and it seems to run 24/7. Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There was a ding on one side that I naturally ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a ding on one side that I naturally didn't see till the truck pulled off, and I didn't notice that they didn't put the kick plate on the front till then too, but after all the installation went well and the fridge seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Kennmore Quality
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is as advertised A+. Additionally, quiet operation, easy to level, and well lighted interior. Delivery professional and friendly. Product arrived well packed and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had a great install team,so nice, cleaned up everything, changed the doors around for me, can't say enough about them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using the ice maker, but this refrigerator is so quiet, and very roomy inside. My husband would love the light to be brighter, I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful refrigerator! Awesome Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful refrigerator! Awesome Amazon price. Just know that if you have copper wiring that they cannot connect the water line for you. Luckily, my husband was able to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Harootunian

customer_reviews.title: Great product, EXCELLENT delivery service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO happy with my purchase, and thrilled that the service people not only installed it, but hauled the other one away.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa U.

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge
customer_reviews.text: Good size, works well, doesn’t seem to use a ton of electricity, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Love my new refrigerator. It is very quiet. Lots of space inside. The delivery guys were wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: James  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I like this refrigerator so far. But one thing to be aware off. The door is stainless steel but the sides are a greenish/grey. I thought the sides would be stainless too. Also, there is no light in the freezer compartment. This unit is very similar to the Kenmore we replaced, which lasted 22 years. Hoping for similar reliability in this one.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Great Frig
customer_reviews.text: Great frig, the ice maker make plenty of ice and there large cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sandgren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great product just waiting for handle to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Initial unit was defective
customer_reviews.text: We had a defective unit. Within 2 days the refrigerator portion stopped working altogether and the freezer was too cold. We ended up losing $250 worth of groceries. A technician came out and a replacement was promptly ordered and delivered. The new unit has been working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good solid product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: So far worth every penny, but it has only been 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY L.

customer_reviews.title: ... that had rollers on the bottom to make it easy to roll out to clean out the lint
customer_reviews.text: I had a 18" that had rollers on the bottom to make it easy to roll out to clean out the lint, but this 21" is bulky built like a tank but considering all that, trade off is worth it. This has more power saving features and keeps food cool or frozen at low settings. Also is quiet (Tip: If it makes loud noises disable the ice maker, usually that is the cause.). Obviously more spacious than my previous fridge. Again the portability was the drawback, next time could ya add mini wheels and make it easy to move around?
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Freezer Light
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that the freezer does not have a light. Had I had known that, I would have looked for a different model. What good is it to not have a light?? Would love to know if there is a way to make a trade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is simple and does the job! The stainless steel makes it very sleek and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Bad design... Ices up continuously and ice maker works whenever it feels like it... Handle just broke
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this Kenmore Refrigerator,,\ quite, lots of room,led lighting (not in freezer) only issue was ice maker didn't work when delivered one call to customer service and a Kenmore tech was sent to my home fixed a loose connection and has been great since
customer_reviews.author: Dirtyburg

customer_reviews.title: A great investment
customer_reviews.text: I love love this refrigerator. It is very roomy, has a wonderful finish and is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Queen

customer_reviews.title: Poor device and warranty
customer_reviews.text: The unit isn’t cool but ice cream everywhere in the freezer section
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother. My mim’s fridge went out and I bought this for her. Delivery was prompt and set up was awesome. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: F. Truett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the size. Fits way more inside than I expected. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Everything Not Included
customer_reviews.text: Does not include hookup for ice maker. Had to purchase separately off the delivery truck.
customer_reviews.author: RICKY LEE BROGDEN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great Fridge for the money. Make sure that if you have an icemaker hook up currently, that it has a shut off valve BEHIND the unit. They will not hook up your new icemaker if the shutoff is say below the refrigerator in the basement like mine was. They did haul off my old fridge as well. Great value here. Nice looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The fridge was the perfect size for our school's staff lounge.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Granado

customer_reviews.title: Buy the extended warrenty
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy the extended warranty. It worked great for a year and four months, then started to frost up in the freezer, and things were freezing in the fridge (yes I was adjusting the temp control and fan speed). Then the fan in the freezer was shut down by ice build up, while the fridge compressor failed. The temp in the freezer was always cold even with no fan, but the fridge was cool only by heat conduction with the upper freezer. I would buy this again (if available) but with the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered with a dent in the door
customer_reviews.text: Our refrigerator was delivered with a dent in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary fridge; the price point was right where I needed it to be to justify the cost. Nice to see an ice maker in a unit at this price point. The interior lighting is fine, although my unit does not have lighting in the freezer section. (I see other questions about this feature.) It's really not a deal-breaker or even an issue for me. Unit seems quiet, and the shelves are easy to adjust. Setup team did a great job. Very professional, prompt and courteous.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

product_meta.title: Kenmore 71215 21 cu.ft. Top-Freezer Refrigerator with Ice Maker and LED Lighting in Stainless Steel with Active Finish, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: Size:21 cu. ft.| Color:Stainless SteelThis Kenmore large top freezer refrigerator has 21 cubic feet of interior space. Features full-width adjustable glass shelves and 2 clear plastic crisper drawers for fresh and crisp fruits and vegetables. The refrigerator features slide-out glass storage shelves for easy access and removal of pies, cakes, casseroles, and larger food items. With the adjustable shelving, you get near-limitless interior organization options. With the convenient door storage there’s more storage for your jugs, bottles, and containers. Gallon door bins make it easy to store tall items and beverages alongside your favorite sauces and dressings. Tall item accommodation on the bottom shelf means more space for bottles of wine and water. The roomy freezer can hold all of your frozen food neatly. This Kenmore frost-free top 5. 8 cubic feet freezer helps you keep foods nice and organized with two door bins and a single shelf. The frost-free freezer helps reduce freezer burn on your freezer and the food stored inside it. Keep drinks ice cold with the included built-in icemaker. Never dig around in the dark again for a late-night slice of pie. Fridge/freezer combo features energy efficient and long-lasting LED lighting. The interior lighting casts a warm, natural light on your refrigerated foods. Features a clean back design that hides the condenser coils, preventing the accumulation of dust and providing you with better refrigerating performance. Active Finish ensures the stainless steel remains smudge-free and clean. Kenmore recommends measuring your space to ensure the freezer/refrigerator combo will fit. DIMENSIONS: 33. 8" x 32. 87" x 66. 1" STORAGE SPACE: 21 cubic feet of interior storage space COLOR: Stainless Steel with Active Finish INCLUDES DELIVERY: Purchase includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout. Hook-up does not include installation of water line.
feature_bullets: FREEZER AND REFRIGERATOR: 21 cubic feet top freezer with refrigerator on bottom. Large freezer for storing frozen items with built-in icemaker
EASY ACCESS SHELVING: Refrigerator features slide-out glass storage shelves for easy access and removal of pies, cakes, casseroles, and larger food items
CONVENIENT STORAGE: Adjustable and easy to remove shelving to customize your storage space. Gallon door bins for taller and wider food or beverage products. 2 clear crisper drawers for produce
BETTER PERFORMANCE: Clean back design hides condenser coils, preventing the accumulation of dust and providing you with better refrigerating performance and less maintenance
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Features interior long-lasting LED lighting. Casts a warm, natural light for easy putting away and removal of food and drinks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars392 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
